messages.message: 2x the converse app has completely frozen while waiting for a response from the model; can’t interact with the page at all, after a minute or two chrome will tell me the page is frozen

this now happens to me every time I try to open the converse app, the page gets stuck like this. the document I was interacting with is NVIDIA’s 9-page earnings press release from yesterday (https://nvidianews.nvidia.com/_gallery/download_pdf/646e7438a1383555093ab633/)

trying to debug this a little, I see this request pending for a long time:

```https://aihub.instabase.com/apps/ocr/review-doc/lennykhazan-gmail/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/aihub/6a4459c7-86ad-4974-847f-b96c24873d05/documents/out/2004.08500_a122db1dd05234a178a86240ff1fb434fe47a2cf0c7dd1e8e15a3b84db48f672.pdf.ibdoc/load_record?i=0&raw=True&fields=layouts```
the entire time it was pending the entire UI is frozen (spinners don’t spin, can’t even navigate back). if the request doesn’t time out, then when the response comes back the page finally loads, however it’s still extremely slow and often freezes.

the last request I made was “please extract a table of GAAP numbers” to the document I linked above, to which it gave me this:
ever since that message converse has been unusable, not sure if it’s a coincidence or not
haha I uploaded the same doc
also taking an extremely long time to answer
i actually got pretty good answers (from the advanced model) about the doc! until it froze up :melting_face:
